io.github.subhamtyagi.encryption

Class Crypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.subhamtyagi.encryption.Crypto

  • public class Crypto
extends java.lang.Object
    The main Crypto API for encryption and decryption of byte arrays and files.

               throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,

        Parameters:
        input - the byte array input
        password - the password
        Returns:
        an encrypted byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if initialization or encryption fails
        java.io.IOException - if there's a problem constructing the result
